Connect Obsidian vault to Hugo
Option A: Symlink your Obsidian folders Option B: Copy files (simpler, but manual) Choose a Hugo theme that works well with Obsidian Popular choices:
PaperMod (clean, great for notes) Docsy (documentation-style) LoveIt Ananke (official, simple) git submodule add https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod themes/PaperMod Set theme in config.toml: theme = "PaperMod"
baseURL = "https://yourdomain.com/" languageCode = "en-us" title = "My Obsidian Notes" theme = "PaperMod" [params] ShowReadingTime = true ShowToc = true
